NAMESPACE_PATTERN: cmd:kubectl get pod --all-namespaces | grep pm-bulk | grep -E "caf1-system|caf2-system|minipolcaf|minirivcaf|miniaurcaf|aurcafgp2|polcafgp2|ttncafgp1|syocafgp1|chacafgp1|rivcafgp2" | awk '{print $1}'

SFTP.HOSTNAME_PATTERN: cmd:kubectl get svc --all-namespaces | grep 'eric-pm-bulk-reporter ' | egrep -E 'aurcafgp2|polcafgp2|ttncafgp1|syocafgp1|chacafgp1|rivcafgp2|miniaurcaf|minipolcaf|minirivcaf|caf1-system|caf2-system|caf3-system|caf4-system' | awk '{print $5}'

FORWARD_STRUCTS.HOSTNAME: cmd:kubectl get service | grep splunkfwd | awk 'FNR == 1 {print $4}'
